name: SP CAPITAL MANAGEMENT, LLC
sampleDescriptions: Protecting international investments by American investors
Lobbied in support of funding for Ukrainian companies, and reconstruction efforts post-war. Lobbied in support of adding clarifying language to H.R. 4175/S.2003, the REPO For Ukrainians Act.
